description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF EXISTING REAR ROOF & SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSIONS; 3 FRONT ROOFLIGHTS
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations, pertaining to the single storey rear extension, would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations, pertaining to the rear roof extension, would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations, pertaining to the front rooflights, would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
